plot: A continuation of the previous seres, Ashita no Joe. After accidently killing his rival in a boxing match six months ago, Joe, a boxer, steps into the ring once again to pick up the pieces of his past and regain his former glory.
opening_theme: "Kizudarake no Eikou (傷だらけの栄光)" by Takeshi Obo (eps 1-25)
ending_theme: "Hateshinaki Yami no Kanata ni (果てしなき闇の彼方に)" by Takeshi Obo (eps 1-25)
"Hateshinaki Yami no Kanata ni (果てしなき闇の彼方に)" by Ichiro Araki (eps 26-47)
